channel.title: Need help with client.java
channel.description:
Ok this is really annoying me.....i change everything and doesnt work for example "selling barrows armor here" this is what it says on sever bye the npc "1700" i change to this "selling p00nage st00f" the npc "1700" compile the sever and rune and doesnt work -.- i change the cords x 1534 y 4756 npc 135 to x 2746 y 4378 and DOES work basicly i want to edit what npcs say and change the other things like the message "welcome to Gnarlyscape" but doesnt work it only works when i chnage stuff in shops and change when npcs spawn obbusly im complieing and running right because when i change the cords where npcs stand it works
if anyone can tell me how to change what npcs say sucessfully i would be very greatfull doesnt work when i chnage what shop owners say to...

item.title: Need help with client.java
